attributes.action: Ban fireworks in households to protect people and animals with PTSD
attributes.additional_details: People and animals that suffer from PTSD can die of heart attacks or suffer major health consequences caused by the stress they feel during and after these displays. Also if not used correctly can hurt the user and damaged properties surrounding it.
attributes.background: Please ban people to use fireworks in private properties. Fireworks should be used in venues designated to it and handled only by professionals or like public areas for special occasions and not in residential areas. They should be banned to be used in all residential areas.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
